job_description: Senior Manager II, Data Science, Onsite, Search & Programmatic Media Analytics and Innovation - job post Sam's Club (part of Walmart) 24,381 reviews San Bruno, CA $184,000 - $260,000 a year -  Part-time You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Salary $184,000 - $260,000 a year Job Type Part-time In addition to base salary, Walmart total compensation may also include bonus incentives, stock options, and more. Position Summary... What you'll do... At Sam's Club, we are member obsessed. We look to add value to Sam's Club membership, and we partner with suppliers to bring unique and exciting values to our members through relevant and personalized ad experience. The Sam's Club Member Access Platform [MAP] is the nexus of the Supplier -Marketer- Merchant partnership and are responsible for delivering our suppliers (advertisers) impactful omnichannel member additive ad experiences. The Measurement Insights and Data Strategy [MINDS] team is a newly formed data and analytics function within the MAP organization, responsible for providing media activation strategy and insights to advertisers by leveraging Sam's Club's unique strength in omni-channel and 100% traceable member journey data with close-loop campaign measurement. The MINDS team will play a critical role in accelerating the growth of Sam's Club media business with the best-in-class measurement and audience insights solutions. In this Onsite, Search & Programmatic Media Analytics and Innovation Data Scientist role, you will bring thought leadership and hands-on experience in onsite and programmatic media analytics with a special emphasis on paid search media. You will play a key role in driving adoption of paid search among the top Fortune 500 suppliers, along with onsite and programmatic solutions. Background and industry experience with successful retail media network, CPG shopper marketing, analytics, digital, retail media analytics, or ad tech company is highly preferred. You are curious and closely monitor the ever-changing digital media landscape and familiar with both incumbent and emerging digital media channels, including display, omnichannel, video, CTV, social commerce, shoppable ads, etc. You will interface closely with Analytics COE, Sales, Marketing and Ops teams and have the opportunity to make a direct impact on the growth of MAP business. This role will report into MAP's Head of Measurement Insights and Data Strategy. You'll make an impact by... Spearheading the development of onsite, search and programmatic media and audience targeting solutions and measurement tools to drive adoption of MAP product mix Driving innovations in onsite, search and programmatic measurement and reporting to inform media strategy and planning. Providing thought leadership for best practices in retail media analytics, metrics and KPIs for digital ad product mix Delivering best-in class search analytics, including keyword, share of voice, path to conversion, and incrementality analysis Developing SPA insights for full funnel, upper and lower tactics to maximize conversion with search, while driving awareness and consideration through brand amplifiers and broad reach SPA programs Playing a key consultant role to Sales team to identify new media activation opportunities leveraging insights from longitudinal campaign performance, category & seasonal trends Participating in quarterly/ annual business reviews with advertisers as SPA SME to present white space opportunities, category/ market trends, competitive dynamics, and supplier optimization headroom Collaborating with Analytics COE to grow and elevate SPA analytics practice and expanding JBP analytics menu offering Partnering with cross functional business partners in Product, Engineering, and eComm Site Analytics to drive media analytics forward You'll sweep us off our feet if you... Have a Bachelors or advanced degree in Statistics, Data Analytics, Digital Marketing or related field Possess 10+ years of experience in retail media, digital media, marketing measurement and site/ search analytics Can demonstrate familiarity with digital retail media campaign KPIs (ROAS, iROAS, CPC, CVR, CPM, SOV, AOV, ACOS, TACOS, impressions, reach, frequency, etc.) Are well versed in ad-tech and mar-tech industry with extensive experience in measuring performance across the purchase funnel Possess outstanding analytical and communication skills; can develop presentation slides and narratives Possess the ability to conduct advanced analytics to discover key insights and deliver actionable recommendations through tools such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Python, R, Spark SQL and MLlib for custom analysis, in conjunction with SQL for data query and extraction Possess the ability to build ML models to perform classification, regression, clustering, NLP, forecasting, etc. Have a working knowledge of marketing measurement approaches, i.e. econometric modeling, digital multi-touch attribution, experimental A/B testing, predictive modeling, etc. is a plus Have Industry experience with successful retail media BU, CPG shopper marketing/ analytics team, digital/ retail media specialty analytics firm, or ad tech company is highly preferred Are familiar with display, omnichannel, video, CTV, social commerce, shoppable ads, etc. Are comfortable with ambiguity and thrive in an environment with rapid change Are curious, collaborative and enjoys working on complex problems Core Competencies: Retail media analytics, Paid-search, SEO, Onsite and Programmatic campaign, Incrementality measurement, Sponsored product advertising, Integrated Marketing (Digital and Traditional) Analytics, Media Mix Optimization, Google and Adobe Analytics, Consulting, iROAS, Analytics Operations, IRI Unify, Measurement Frameworks, Data Visualization, SQL, Python, R, Spark SQL, MLlib, Tableau, Excel and PowerPoint The above information has been designed to indicate the general nature and level of work performed in the role. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job. The full Job Description can be made available as part of the hiring process. Benefits & Perks Beyond competitive pay, you can receive incentive awards for your performance. Other great perks include 401(k) match, stock purchase plan, paid maternity and parental leave, PTO, multiple health plans, and much more. Equal Opportunity Employer Walmart, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer - By Choice. We believe we are best equipped to help our associates, customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them. That means understanding, respecting and valuing diversity- unique styles, experiences, identities, ideas and opinions - while being inclusive of all people. Who We Are Sam Walton opened the first Sam's Club in 1983 to meet a growing need among customers who wanted to buy merchandise in bulk. Since then, Sam's Club has grown rapidly, operating almost 600 clubs in the US. By offering affordable, wholesale merchandise to members, Sam's Club helps make saving simple for families and small business owners. At Sam's Club, we offer competitive pay as well as performance-based incentive awards and other great benefits for a happier mind, body, and wallet. Health benefits include medical, vision and dental coverage. Financial benefits include 401(k), stock purchase and company-paid life insurance. Paid time off benefits include PTO (including sick leave), parental leave, family care leave, bereavement, jury duty, and voting. Other benefits include short-term and long-term disability, company discounts, Military Leave Pay, adoption and surrogacy expense reimbursement, and more. You will also receive PTO and/or PPTO that can be used for vacation, sick leave, holidays, or other purposes. The amount you receive depends on your job classification and length of employment. It will meet or exceed the requirements of paid sick leave laws, where applicable. For information about PTO, see https://one.walmart.com/notices . Live Better U is a Walmart-paid education benefit program for full-time and part-time associates in Walmart and Sam's Club facilities. Programs range from high school completion to bachelor's degrees, including English Language Learning and short-form certificates. Tuition, books, and fees are completely paid for by Walmart. Eligibility requirements apply to some benefits and may depend on your job classification and length of employment. Benefits are subject to change and may be subject to a specific plan or program terms. For information about benefits and eligibility, see One.Walmart at https://bit.ly/3iOOb1J . The annual salary range for this position is $184,000.00-$260,000.00 Additional compensation includes annual or quarterly performance incentives. Additional compensation for certain positions may also include: Regional Pay Zone (RPZ) (based on location) Stock equity incentives Minimum Qualifications... Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. Option 1: Bachelors degree in Statistics, Economics, Analytics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Information Technology or related field and 5 years' experience in an analytics related field. Option 2: Masters degree in Statistics, Economics, Analytics, Mathematics, Computer Science, Information Technology or related field and 3 years' experience in an analytics related field. Option 3: 7 years' experience in an analytics or related field. Preferred Qualifications... Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. Data science, machine learning, optimization models, PhD in Machine Learning, Computer Science, Information Technology, Operations Research, Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Econometrics, Successful completion of one or more assessments in Python, Spark, Scala, or R, Supervisory experience, Using open source frameworks (for example, scikit learn, tensorflow, torch) Primary Location... 950 ELM AVE, SAN BRUNO, CA 94066-3047, United States of America
